name: mvc4us/mvc4us
description: A juicy PHP framework highly depends on symfony components.

suggest.twig/twig: Twig, the flexible, fast, and secure template language for PHP
suggest.monolog/monolog: Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services
